title: Crime Alert 12.26.18
itunes:title: Crime Alert 12.26.18
description:
Man gets a century long prison sentence for killing boy and hiding his body in cement. Warning to parent social media game called the “Momo Challenge” leads to multiple child suicides. A Texas judge chastises mom saying people treat pets better than she treated her two baby girls. She left them in a hot car overnight. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
